concept.title: Record event results for Gy session

section.p: Whenever a session/event request has occurred, it is either successful or unsuccessful depending upon the logic processing in NCC. The RecordEventResult tag contains the numeric number created by NCC explaining the cause of session/event closure.
Following are the record event result ranges with their descriptions:

ul.li: 21-40: Call unsuccessful due to insufficient balance
41-80: Error due to object not found in database
81-100: Call unsuccessful due to some problem in rule engine output
100-130: Call unsuccessful due to some error, for example Device Barred, Subscription Barred, Group Barred
131-140: Call unsuccessful due to some error in charging service
141-150: Call unsuccessful due to some error in subscription or group
151-200: Call unsuccessful due to some problem in rate configuration
200 onwards: Call unsuccessful due to some configuration problem at call control
300-320: Session clean-up result codes for successful/unsuccessful result due to different events like RAR.

table.title: Record event results for Gy session

row.entry: Record Event Result
Description
Call successful.
Call successful with partial reservation due to not enough balance with the customer. Only partial units were successfully reserved as per the balance available.
Call successful with lost credit when no more credit is left with the customer.
Call successful resulting to lost credit for overcommitted units due to device barring.
Call successful resulting to lost credit for overcommitted units due to the subscription being barred.
Call successful with partial reservation done due to the subscription being barred.
Call successful with requested service units is zero in the update request.
Call successful with no MSCC present.
Call successful, the RSU value is NULL.
Call successful, partial reserve account is barred.
Call successful, lost credit account is barred.
Call successful with reserve from account.
Call successful with partial reserve from account.
Call successful resulting to lost credit for overcommitted units due to all groups being barred in Terminate Request.
Call successful with partial reservation from step bucket.
Successful VoLTE CCR for a session that spanned the account BCR or standalone subscription renewal/expiration time.
Call unsuccessful due to not enough credit.
Call unsuccessful due to not enough credit and credit loss. Itâ€™s a case of overcommit used units sent in Update Request.
Call unsuccessful due to not enough credit and subscription is being barred.
Call unsuccessful due to not enough credit and resulting to a case of lost credit due to subscription being barred in Update Request.
Call unsuccessful due to not enough credit and resulting to lost credit due to all groups being barred in Update Request.
Call unsuccessful due to charging service not found in database.
Call unsuccessful due to account not found in database.
Call unsuccessful due to rate not found in database.
Call unsuccessful due to account database operation in the database.
Call unsuccessful as subscription list not found in database.
Call unsuccessful as converter list not found in database.
Call unsuccessful due to failure in bucket database operation.
Call unsuccessful due to failure in session database operation.
Call unsuccessful due to session not found in database.
Call unsuccessful due to failure in unit type database operation.
Call unsuccessful due to slicing profile not found in database.
Call unsuccessful due to rate ID missing for account selected for charging from tariff.
Call unsuccessful due to rule engine result which was provisioned in the tariff is invalid.
Call unsuccessful due to rule engine result is null , which can be the result when rule's are not loaded properly or any error in Rule engine.
Call unsuccessful due to any failure received from rule engine in its processing.
Call unsuccessful due to the conditions mentioned in rule engine are not applicable to complete the call.
Call unsuccessful since out of many subscription's purchased by the customer few subscriptions are barred but for the rest rule is not applicable.
Call unsuccessful due to non initialization of internal rating object which is used to save the charging information which is the billing quantity object.
Call unsuccessful since the session already exists with the session Id for which the request has been received.
Call unsuccessful due to any generic rating error received while computing any operation.
Call unsuccessful as new reservation not allowed due to device barred.
Call unsuccessful as new reservation not allowed due to subscription barred.
Call unsuccessful due to invalid request type received from the network.
Call unsuccessful as requested service unit is zero.
Call unsuccessful as new reservation not allowed due to all groups being barred.
Call blocked by usage control limits.
Call blocked by usage control TOD.
Call blocked by global barred list.
Call blocked by UC barred list.
Call unsuccessful as charging service list empty.
Call unsuccessful as charging service with subscription not found in the database.
Call unsuccessful as subscription ID NULL in database.
Call unsuccessful as subscription not found in the database.
Call unsuccessful as no subscription attached with device.
Call unsuccessful as all subscription barred.
Call unsuccessful as category is missing for subscription attached with the device.
Call unsuccessful as all groups are barred.
Call unsuccessful due to failure in rate calculation error.
Call unsuccessful due to invalid charging step defined in rate entity.

Call unsuccessful due to invalid rate configuration resulting to a error scenario. The rate object in billingQty is pre-validated. However, this error code mentions that if it is a different rate then perform validation check. This error code is generated in case of invalid rate object.
Call unsuccessful due to a check of rate object passed inside rating logic for calculation. Its a check and error for early rejection of invalid rate object.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to source context missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to device context missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to common call context missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to service info context missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to request type missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to request action missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to request action is not direct debit.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to call type missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to requested service unit missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to device ID missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU unit type missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU IVOL missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU base cc unit type missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU list missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU OVOL missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU service specific value missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU TVOL missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to RSU time value missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to Rating Group missing.
Call unsuccessful and rating failed due to Session ID missing.
Call unsuccessful due to Event Request received in CENTRALIZED charging mode. Event request works only in DE_CENTRALIZED charging mode.
Call unsuccessful due to received null RSU unit type in CENTRALIZED charging mode.
Balance Manager over commit scenario.
Call unsuccessful when device not found.
Call unsuccessful due , Diameter unable to comply.
Call unsuccessful due, USU is missing in request.
Call unsuccessful due, RatingGroup and Service Identifier are missing.
Call unsuccessful, RSU Unit type mismatch.
Call unsuccessful, GSU is missing for USU.
Call unsuccessful, USU Unit Type missing.
Call unsuccessful, USU Unit Type mismatch.
CC-Time is missing from RSU for IMS call.
CC-NEW-MSCC not supported in update and terminate in IMS call.
Local sequence number of USU is not valid.
Reporting reason=final, GSU is missing for USU.

entry.p: Session was deleted, RAR response is no session found.

row.entry: Session deletion failed when it was triggered by RAR response for no session found
Gy/N40 (5G) session was cleared as corresponding device is deleted.
Gy/N40 (5G) session deletion failed when it was triggered by device delete request.
IMS session was cleared as corresponding device is deleted.
IMS session deletion failed when it was triggered by device delete request.
